wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Theodore Bronson (born 12 March 1961 in Apen, Lower Saxony, as Uwe Brunßen) is a German-British politician of the party Alternative für Deutschland (Alternative for Germany  – AfD). In the 2016 elections to Berlin's House of Representatives (Abgeordnetenhaus – AGH), he ran as a direct AfD candidate for the district Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf and was elected to the Berlin's House of Representatives via the AfD list of candidates for the state Berlin (Landes liste).
